lines: Kwakasara makumi mapfumbamwe, Mudanga iro rehwayi
Imwe yarasika kure, Kubva pazambararo rendarama
Kure kumakomo anotonhora, Kubva kune mufudzi vakanaka
Kure kune mufudzi vakanaka
Makumi mapfumbamwe ari pano, Haanga kwaniri here?
Mufudzi akati imwe hapana, Yakapumhukira musango
Kana nzira yakashatisa sei, Ndoâ€™enda kugwenga kundotsvaka
Ndoenda kugwenga, kundotsvaka
Vaponeswa havazivi udzamuhwu,
Hwemvurayo, yakabirwa Kuti awane hwayi yake,
Kure kure kugwenga yakachema Yavapetyo nekuda kuti ife
Kure Kure kugwenga yakachema Yavapetyo nekuda kuti ife
Tenzi iri ropa rabvakupiko, Rataona pamakomo
Rakateukira akarasika Asi mufudzi amudzora
Kongenyi maoko ane madzvadzi, Akabaiwa neminzwa usiku
Akabaiwa neminzwa usiku
Makomo ese arikutinhira, Nekunzwika mumawere
Kudaidzira kunobva kudenga, Farayi hwai yaonekwa
Ngirosi dzinoimba pachigaro, Ngekuti hwayi yavamwa
Farayi ngekuti hwai yavanwa
